Adventurer Helper:
One last time...
Your task is to go to the Blazing Swamp and hunt *Judge of Marsh, Tulben, Glow Wisp,* *Hames Orc Scout, Marsh Predator, Conjurer, Lava* *Wyrm, Hames Orc Footsoldier, Conjurer Bat Lord,* *Hames Orc Sniper, Cursed Guardian, Hames Orc* *Shaman, and Hames Orc Overlords*. Collect *30* *Blazing Swamp Ash and then return to Priest* *Ross* to recieve your reward.
